titleStmt.title: Two homilies concerning the meanes how to resolue the controversies of this time. First written in French, by Ph. Mornay, and now translated into English
Deux homélies du moyen de se résoudre sur les controverses de ce temps. English
titleStmt.author: Mornay, Philippe de, seigneur du Plessis-Marly, 1549-1623.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Deux homélies du moyen de se résoudre sur les controverses de ce temps.
A variant of the edition omitting the author's name from the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
